name: checkout-backlog
description: GitHub Action: Checkout Backlog repository over SSH

scripts.build:bundle: esbuild dist/index.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/index.bundle.js --banner:js="// bundled by esbuild" && mv dist/index.bundle.js dist/index.js && esbuild dist/post.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/post.bundle.js --banner:js="// bundled by esbuild" && mv dist/post.bundle.js dist/post.js
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:bundle
